name: Linea
description: These frames a rectangular design with bold lines, adding a unique and modern touch to the face. Crafted from high-quality materials, they ensure durability and comfort, making them suitable for everyday wear. The meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail highlight a sense of luxury and authenticity. The temples are elegantly engraved with the brand’s name, showcasing a sleek and distinguished style. These glasses are an ideal choice for those seeking a combination of style and comfort.

name: Bordo
description: These frames feature a unique geometric design that stands out with bold and distinctive contours. Made with premium-quality materials, they offer both durability and a lightweight feel for maximum comfort. The intricate craftsmanship ensures a flawless finish, highlighting attention to detail and an appreciation for refined aesthetics. The temples are carefully engraved with the Nobile branding, enhancing the frame’s sophisticated and modern look. These glasses are a perfect choice for individuals who seek a blend of innovative design, quality, and comfort.
